channel.title: billion on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in billion on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-12
item.description: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the world’s largest language models (7 minute read) Microsoft and Nvidia have trained what they claim is the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-02
item.description: Google developing own CPUs for Chromebook laptops (4 minute read) Google is developing its own central processors for its notebook and tablet computers and plans to roll them out around 2023.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-27
item.description: Poparazzi hypes itself to the top of the App Store (7 minute read) Poparazzi is a new social networking app that lets users create accounts that only their friends can post to.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-09
item.description: Tesla buys $1.5 billion in bitcoin, plans to accept it as payment (2 minute read) Tesla announced that it bought $1.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-12
item.description: Airbnb plans to confidentially file for IPO this month (1 minute read) Airbnb is planning to submit a confidential filing with the SEC to go public this month, with shares trading by the end of the year.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-06
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 software detailed in new leak (2 minute read) Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 will likely feature customizable watch faces and updates to its music, email, and calendar apps.
